param.name: min_cov
param.label: Min coverage
param.help: List matches above this fraction of aligned (covered) residues.(default: 0.5)(-c)

param.name: min_id
param.label: Min identity
param.help: List matches above this sequence identity (for clustering) (range 0.0-1.0) (default: 0.8)(--min-seq-id)

param.name: cluster_reassign
param.label: Cluster reassign
param.help: Cascaded clustering can cluster sequence that do not fulfill the clustering criteria.Cluster reassignment corrects these errors.(--cluster-reassign)

param.name: coverage_mode
param.label: Coverage mode
param.option: 3:target seq(length has to be at least x% of query length)
4:query seq(length has to be at least x% of target length)
5:short seq(needs to be at least x% of the other seq)

param.name: cluster_mode
param.label: Cluster mode
param.help: All clustering modes transform the alignment results into an undirected graph.(--cluster-mode)

param.name: features_selection
param.label: Features Seclection
param.help: Features selection by calculating the mutual information score of features

param.name: iterator
param.help: The transfrags with minimal reads coverage (default: 3).

param.name: thread
param.label: Threads
param.help: The number of threads used for parallel computation.

exit_code.description: Error Running combine collection to a file

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
In this function, we utilized MMSeq2 (Steinegger *et al*., 2017) to cluster the assembled transfrags with both mRNA and ncRNA sequences from the Ensembl Plants across all plant species. Both assembled tranfrags and annotated plant sequences to serve as positive sample set. Then we used the corain package (Wang *et al*., 2023) to encode for RNA from three perspectives, sequence, structure and physical chemical properties. Adopted the improved PSoL(IPSol) algorithm (Wang *et al*., 2006), the initial negative samples were generated from "unlabeled" sample set based on the PU bagging algorithm, the expanded negative samples iteratively using RF classifier until the designated iteration number was reached.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs**
- **Input the transfrags file:** Input the transfrags in FASTA format
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Parameters**
- **Min reads coverage:** The transfrags with minimal reads coverage (default: 3)
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Outputs**
- **Filtered transfrags with reads coverage in FASTA format**
